input.sentences: at the conference they went over all the ideas that were submitted
they were all put on display
they gave away shirts to celebrate their milestones
and concluded it with the executives giving a speech
output.sentences: All of the businessmen submitted ideas for the conference.
Their ideas were put onto a display.
The ones whose ideas met milestones received shirts to celebrate.
The ideas were the result of many brainstorming sessions.
Afterwards the executives gave a speech to all the employees who had good ideas.
